statements: SELECT * FROM feedbacks
SELECT id, feedback_text, rating FROM feedbacks WHERE rating > 4
SELECT user_id, activity_id, timestamp FROM feedbacks ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM feedbacks WHERE activity_id = 10 AND rating < 3
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_feedbacks FROM feedbacks
SELECT * FROM feedbacks WHERE user_id = 3 AND rating > 4 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, feedback_text FROM feedbacks WHERE rating < 3 LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, MAX(rating) AS max_rating FROM feedbacks GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2
SELECT MIN(timestamp) AS earliest_timestamp, MAX(timestamp) AS latest_timestamp FROM feedbacks
SELECT activity_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM feedbacks GROUP BY activity_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY avg_rating DESC
SELECT * FROM UserFeedback WHERE user_id = 101;
SELECT user_id, feedback FROM UserFeedback WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT feedback, timestamp FROM UserFeedback ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM AssessmentData WHERE score > 80;
SELECT user_id, activity_id, score FROM AssessmentData WHERE date = '2023-05-15';
SELECT user_id, feedback, timestamp FROM UserFeedback WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT feedback, timestamp, user_id FROM UserFeedback WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, feedback FROM UserFeedback WHERE feedback LIKE '%great%';
SELECT user_id, timestamp, feedback FROM UserFeedback WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, feedback, timestamp FROM UserFeedback WHERE timestamp < NOW() - INTERVAL 1 WEEK;
SELECT * FROM UserFeedback WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT activity_id, feedback_text FROM UserFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT activity_id, assessment_score FROM ActivityAssessment WHERE assessment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT activity_name, activity_type FROM ActivityDetails WHERE activity_duration_minutes > 60 ORDER BY activity_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(assessment_id) AS num_assessments FROM ActivityAssessment GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_assessments > 3;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text, rating FROM UserFeedback WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT activity_id, user_id, assessment_score FROM ActivityAssessment WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY assessment_score DESC
SELECT activity_id, activity_name, activity_type, activity_duration_minutes FROM ActivityDetails WHERE activity_type = 'Outdoor'
SELECT user_id, activity_id, assessment_score, assessment_date FROM ActivityAssessment WHERE activity_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY assessment_date DESC
SELECT user_id, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM UserFeedback GROUP BY user_id HAVING AVG(rating) > 3
SELECT * FROM UserFeedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text, rating FROM UserFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT activity_name, activity_date FROM ActivityDetails WHERE activity_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, assessment_text, assessment_score FROM UserAssessment ORDER BY assessment_score DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_name, log_date FROM UserActivityLog JOIN ActivityDetails ON UserActivityLog.activity_id = ActivityDetails.activity_id WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM UserFeedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text, rating FROM UserFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_name, activity_date FROM ActivityDetails WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT ua.user_id, ua.assessment_text, ad.activity_name FROM UserAssessment ua JOIN ActivityDetails ad ON ua.activity_id = ad.activity_id;
SELECT ual.user_id, ad.activity_name, ual.log_date FROM UserActivityLog ual JOIN ActivityDetails ad ON ual.activity_id = ad.activity_id WHERE ad.activity_name LIKE '%Exercise%';
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT id, user_id, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_text, timestamp FROM feedback ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT activity_id, COUNT(id) AS total_feedback FROM feedback GROUP BY activity_id;
SELECT * FROM assessments WHERE grade >= 80 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM activities WHERE category = 'Sports' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT assessments.id, assessments.grade, users.name FROM assessments INNER JOIN users ON assessments.user_id = users.id WHERE assessments.grade >= 80 ORDER BY assessments.grade DESC;

SELECT users.name, activities.name, assessments.grade FROM users LEFT JOIN assessments ON users.id = assessments.user_id LEFT JOIN activities ON assessments.activity_id = activities.id WHERE assessments.grade IS NULL;
SELECT categories.name, COUNT(activities.id) AS activity_count FROM categories LEFT JOIN activities ON categories.id = activities.category GROUP BY categories.name ORDER BY activity_count DESC;
